title: Newark, New Jersey
summary: Newark (/ˈnʊərk/ NEW-ərk,[26] locally /nɔːrk/ NORK)[27] is the most populous city in the U.S. state of New Jersey and the seat of Essex County and part of the New York metropolitan area.[28] As one of the nation's major air, shipping, and rail hubs, the city had a population of 311,549 in 2020,[14] making it the nation's 62nd-most populous municipality,[16] after being ranked 73rd in the nation in 2010.[17]
